p:
Antiblemma leucocyma caterpillars are defoliators that make irregular holes in leaves. They are green and have a distinctive looping walk (
Figure 1E— F ), and were found in all three places ( Figure 2C). Caterpillars of this species were found during the evaluation period in Dionísio. In Viçosa, their population peaks occurred from April 2005 to February 2006, while in Guaraciaba, they occurred only from May to July 2005 ( Figure 2C).
